StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateEmailAddress]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @EmailAddress varchar(50), @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN --- UPDATE NWA EMAIL ADDRESS UPDATE NWA SET EMAIL_ADDRESS = @EmailAddress, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID END
